actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to provide that general revenue sharing payments to local governments may be used only to reduce school taxes.

summary.text: Requires that general revenue-sharing payments to local governments may be used only to reduce school taxes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to provide that general revenue sharing payments to local governments may be used only to reduce school taxes.
